19441.ja: <start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>「ぜえぜえ……。ぜえぜえ……。<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19441.ko: <start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>: 헉, 헉……. 헉, 헉…….<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19441.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>呼呼……呼呼……<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19441.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>呼呼……呼呼……<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19442.en:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>Geez. Oh, you. I'm amazed you found
me. I'd be happy to make you my
subordinate.<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19442.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>「ぜえぜえ……。あ…あなた。
　よく　見つけてくれ…ましたね……。
　ぶ…部下に　してあげても…いいくらいですわ。<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19442.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>: 헉, 헉……. 다… 당신.
　용케 잘 찾았…네요…….
　부… 부하로 삼아 주고… 싶을 정도예요.<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19442.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>呼呼……你……居然真的……
找到了……
你简直……可以……做我的部下了呢。<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19442.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>呼呼……你、你啊。
居然真的……找到了……
簡、簡直可以……做我的部下了。<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19443.en:
Come on, Father. We're running out of time! To survive in the Town of Orphea, you must break the curse with
Benediction!
19443.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>「さあ…神父さま。一刻を　争いますわ！
　オルフェアの町で　生き残るためにも
　おはらいで　呪いを解いてあげてください！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19443.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>: 자… 신부님, 지체할 시간이 없어요!
　오르페어 마을에서 살아남기 위해서라도
　부정 씻기로 저주를 풀어 주세요!<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19443.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>快……神父大人。刻不容缓！
为了在欧鲁非亚镇保住地位，
请您为他解开诅咒吧！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19443.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>快……神父。刻不容緩！
為了在歐菲亞鎮保住地位，
請您用驅散為他解除詛咒吧！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19444.en:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>Wait a minute. Wait a minute. I
haven't run in a while. I can't
breathe.<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19444.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>「ちょ…ちょっと　待ちたまえ。
　ひさしぶりに走ったから　呼吸が……。<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19444.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>: 자… 잠깐만 기다려 주게.
　오랜만에 달렸더니 숨이…….<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19444.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>稍……稍等一下。
好久没这样跑过了，喘不上气……<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19444.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>稍……稍等一下。
好久沒這樣跑了，喘不上氣……<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19445.en:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>Soooooooo. Soooooooooooooooooooooooooo
oooooooooooooooooooooooooooo.
Soooooooo. Ssoooooooooooooooooooooo.<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19445.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>「すぅーーー。はぁーーー。
　すぅーーー。はぁーーー。<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19445.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>: 스읍~~~ 하아~~~
　스읍~~~ 하아~~~<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19445.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>吸气～呼气～
吸气～呼气～<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19445.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>吸氣────呼氣────
吸氣────呼氣────<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19446.en:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>Phew. I've calmed down a bit. We can't
overlook someone in trouble. Let's
break the curse right away.<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19446.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>「ふぅ。少しは　落ち着きました。
　困っている方を　見過ごせません。
　さっそく　呪いを解きましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19446.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>: 후우, 이제 좀 살 것 같군요.
　곤경에 처한 분을 모른 척할 수는 없지요.
　바로 저주를 풀어드리겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19446.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>呼……稍微缓过来了。
不能对遇到困难的人视而不见。
我这就解开诅咒！<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19446.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>呼……稍微緩過來了。
不能對遇到困難的人視而不見。
我這就解除詛咒。<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19447.en:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>Oh, God! My Lord! From his body, cast
out the curse!<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19447.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>「おお　神よ！　わが主よ！
　この者の身体より
　呪いを　はらいたまえ！<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19447.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>: 오오, 신이시여! 주여!
　이자의 몸에서
　저주를 몰아내 주소서!<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19447.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>噢，神啊！我的主啊！
请将这个人身上的诅咒
解除吧！<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19447.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>喔喔，神啊！我的主啊！
請驅散這個人
身上的詛咒吧！<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19448.en: <start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>Oh! It moves! The body's moving!<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19448.ja: <start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>「おお！　動く！　身体が動くぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19448.ko: <start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>: 오오! 움직인다! 몸이 움직여!<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19448.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>哦哦！动了！我的身体能动了！<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19448.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>喔喔！動了！我的身體能動了！<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19449.en:
<start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>Thank you, I will be back soon!
Traveler! Thank you! Priest!<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19449.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>「ありがとうございます！　旅の方！
　ありがとうございます！　神父さま！<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19449.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>: 고맙습니다! 여행자님!
　고맙습니다! 신부님!<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19449.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>谢谢旅行者！
谢谢神父大人！<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19449.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>謝謝旅行者！
謝謝神父！<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19450.en:
<start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>My name is Meroponesse from Turtle
Raman! I will never forget this favor!<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19450.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>「私　カメラマンの　メロポネスといいます！
　この　ご恩は　一生忘れません！<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19450.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>: 전 사진 작가인 메로포네스라고 합니다!
　이 은혜는 평생 잊지 않겠습니다!<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19450.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>我是个摄影师，名叫梅伦坡奈斯！
你们的大恩大德，我永世不忘！<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19450.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00717 _normal m00001>我是個攝影師，名叫梅洛波涅斯！
你們的大恩大德，我永世難忘！<stop_lip_animation n00717 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19451.en: <start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>No, I did not. I did what I had to do.<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19451.ja: <start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>「いえ……。当然のことをしたまで……<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19451.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>: 아닙니다…….
　당연한 일을 했을 뿐인걸요……<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19451.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>别客气……我只是做了自己该做的事……<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19451.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>別客氣……我只是做了自己該做的事……<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19452.en:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>I did it! I've broken the curse!
Spread the word, and Father will be
safe! He won't be driven out of town!<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19452.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>「や…やりました！　呪いを解いたわ！
　このウワサを広めれば　神父さまは安泰ね！
　町から　追いだされずに済むわ！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19452.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>: 서… 성공이에요! 저주를 풀었어요!
　이 소문이 퍼지면 신부님의 지위도 좋아지겠죠.
　마을에서 쫓겨날 일도 없을 거예요!<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19452.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>成……成功了！诅咒解开了！
这件事被传开的话，神父大人也能扬眉吐气了！
这下就不会被赶出镇子啦！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19452.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>成……成功了！詛咒解除了！
只要這件事被傳開，神父就能安然度日！
不用擔心會被趕出市鎮了！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19453.en:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>You! I'll thank you for your help.
You'll have to come to Church later!<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19453.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>「あなた！　お礼をするから
　後で　教会に来てくださいね！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19453.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>: 당신! 답례를 할 테니
　나중에 교회로 오도록 해요!<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19453.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>啊，我会给你谢礼的，
所以之后请来教会一趟！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19453.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>啊，我會給你謝禮的，
晚點請來教會一趟！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19454.en: <start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>Come on! Let's go, Father!<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19454.ja: <start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>「さあ！　行きましょう　神父さま！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19454.ko: <start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>: 자! 가죠, 신부님!<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19454.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>好啦！走吧，神父大人！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19454.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00712 _normal m00001>好啦！我們走吧，神父！<stop_lip_animation n00712 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19455.en: <start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>You don't have to shout so close.<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19455.ja: <start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>「こんな近くで　叫ばなくても……。<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19455.ko: <start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>: 그렇게 가까이서 소리칠 필요는…….<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19455.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>这么近的距离就不用那么大声喊我了吧……<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19455.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00687 _normal m00001>距離這麼近，用不著大聲喊吧……<stop_lip_animation n00687 CLOSE_MOUTH>
